summary: This is a calendar entry for a 'Epstein Press Meeting' scheduled for July 1, 2019, at the 8th Floor Library, organized by Geoffrey Berman of the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It appears to be a planning document for a press event related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: He is listed as the organizer of the 'Epstein Press Meeting' for the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

events.title: Epstein Press Meeting
events.description: A scheduled press meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein, organized by the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: A press meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for July 1, 2019, by the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The meeting was organized by US Attorney Geoffrey Berman.
The document is a calendar entry created on June 28, 2019, indicating planning for a public statement or update on the Epstein case.
